flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: SmartSignis a leading online supplier of no smoking signs in various materials including vinyl, plastic and aluminum. Suitable for all facilities, smoking allowed signs, double-sided no smoking decals and funny smoking signs are available under single roof. All signs carry a 100% Made-in-America guarantee and are offered at the best prices online. Customization wizard is one of the best in the industry where buyers can create their own signs and view it simultaneously. Unlike competitors, there are no additional charges when users send their own designs to customize no smoking signs.

guide.summary: SmartSign offers an array of no smoking decals and signs that help you build a smoke-free facility.
guide.title: No Smoking Signs and Smoking Allowed Signs
